concept.title: Change a 3D View Dynamically
concept.shortdesc: You can view objects fromany viewing direction by holding down the mouseor other pointing devices and moving dynamically. With dynamic viewing, you can display the effects of changing viewpoint while you change the view.

conbody.p: You can execute move or zoomoperations as the 3D Orbit is active.
When the 3D Orbit is active, you are not allowed to modify objects. To close 3D Orbit, press Enter, ESC or choose Exit from the shortcut menu.
